column4: I have two computers here running Ubuntu, both with wireless cards. How can I connect them to use one of them as a slave device for its hard drive? I want to be able to backup files and drag-drop as if it were just an external hard drive.
have you thought about making a samba serve?
& hercury: Samba...is that a program I can download?
Konsole, yeats: That makes me feel a lot better, thanks! So as for this Samba, HD sharing question... is anyone willing to walk be through it?
